mapper.select: select * from teamnotice tn left join user_info ui on (tn.tn_writer = ui.user_no) where team_num = 1 order by tn_date desc
select * from teamnotice tn left join user_info ui on (tn.tn_writer = ui.user_no) where tn_no = #{ tn_no }
mapper.delete: delete from teamnotice where tn_no = #{ tn_no }
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum, tn_no, team_num, tn_writer, user_nn, tn_title, tn_content, tn_date, tn_originalfilename, tn_renamefilename from teamnotice tn left join user_info ui on (tn.tn_writer = ui.user_no) where team_num = #{ team_num } order by tn_date desc) where rownum between 1 and 10
